title: owncloud does not update label  field in vcf address records
body:
i am using owncloud actively to manage my addresses. i have moved away from kdes kontact for this.
kontact however used the vcard 3.0 address labels. 
this field contains the formatted address.
e.g.
label;type=home:fam. jones\nmystreet no. 42\n1234 aa mytown

the label can be directly used for printing address labels (like i do at this time of year;-)

in order to implement these labels properly, two things need to be taken into account:  

first of all, different countries have different specific formattings of addresses.
the netherlands for instance has 
<full name>
<street no>
<zipcode> <city>
other countries have different formats
formatting should be according to locale setting of the country and in case the
country is given for an adress acording to that specific country settings.
this requires a list of address formats per country. kontact and evolution already has such a maybe this can be reused.

secondly for the address label, the full name (fn) field should be used as input. not the first name/last name from the name (n). fn can override the writing of the family or first name. in my situation i often put something like "family jones" in the fn field or "drs prins".  

i hope this bug can be resolved. currently i'm stuck printing address labels
using glabels and the owncloud addressbook as input. 

kind regards,

bert haverkamp
